summary: REQ-1 targets a specific text color change within the Women empowerment section in `HomePage.tsx`. The diff for `HomePage.tsx` is truncated before that section appears, so the required class change cannot be verified from the provided evidence. Two additional non-requested files were modified (`frontend-file-summaries.txt`, `project_state.json`).

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the Women empowerment section on the Home page (the “Empowering Women Through Griha Mahila Udyog” section in `frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx`) so that the paragraph/body text renders in black instead of white (via Tailwind/CSS class changes in that section only).
missing_requirements.reason: The provided `HomePage.tsx` diff is truncated before the “Empowering Women Through Griha Mahila Udyog” section, so there is no direct evidence that `text-white`/`prose-p:text-white` (or equivalent) were removed/replaced in that specific section, nor that no other sections’ text colors were changed.
